articles.description: Gas prices in New York state are up 17 cents from a week ago and 70 cents from a month ago.
articles.content:
Gas prices are nearing $5 a gallon as the unofficial start to summer approaches with Memorial Day weekend.
Average gas prices in New York state increased to $4.933 per gallon of regular unleaded gas… [+2117 chars]
